title: Dominion IO
text: Grow the bigger army to crush your opponents. Strategize your moves and outgrow others!

title: Body Maker 3D
text: Have you ever thought that you could inject your fat from unnecessary to necessary places? Play now and do it as you want!

title: Mutant Fighter
text: Become the best fighter in the universe by becoming the ultimate predator by evolving yourself!

title: City Monster Master
text: Rampage through the city as a mutant animal . Survive for the highest score.

title: Insect Hunter 3D
text: Fun game with many scenarios. Drag to aim and release to shoot. Can you kill all of the insects?
